name: BMX Racer 3D. Moto Race Skills
description:
In BMX Racer, feel the endless stunting genre in whole new race tracks. Be a bike theft! Use intrinsic controls to ride your bike through the challenging racing tracks. Race, jump and crash your way and beat other rivals on grand race paths. Complete your racing missions in given time by collecting items and destroying obstacles to the finish the track. Drive your bike through amazing landscapes and perform some amazing stunts on the ramps.

Choose your bike among 5 super Grand BMX bikes with super suspension and realistic biking physics. Ride through some challenging levels and score high. Each level for the theft will be more thrilling than the previous level. So what are you waiting for? Come break all the rules and experience mind-blowing bike racing action in all new BMX Racer game!
